Title: US01 – Register
Description: As a visitor I want to create an account so that I can write, like and comment on posts.

Title: US02 – Login
Description: As a visitor I want to log in using username + password so that I can access protected features.

Title: US03 – Receive JWT token
Description: As a logged-in user I want to receive a JWT token so that I can access secure endpoints.

Title: US04 – Keep me logged in
Description: As a user I want a long-lived optional token so that I stay logged in longer.

Title: US05 – View my profile
Description: As a logged-in user I want to view my profile so that I can verify my data.

Title: US06 – Edit profile
Description: As a logged-in user I want to edit my profile (except username) so that my data stays up to date.

Title: US07 – Delete profile
Description: As a logged-in user I want to delete my account so that my data is removed.

Title: US08 – Create blogpost
Description: As a logged-in user I want to create a blogpost so that I can publish content.

Title: US09 – Edit blogpost
Description: As the author I want to edit my blogpost so that I can fix or update it.

Title: US10 – Delete blogpost
Description: As the author I want to delete my blogpost so that I maintain control over my content.

Title: US11 – View all blogposts
Description: As a visitor I want to browse blogposts with sorting and pagination so that I can find interesting content.

Title: US12 – View blogpost details
Description: As a visitor I want to view the full details of a post so that I can read the content, author info, likes, and comments.

Title: US13 – Like blogpost
Description: As a logged-in user I want to like a blogpost so that I can show appreciation.

Title: US14 – Add comment
Description: As a logged-in user I want to comment on a blogpost so that I can share my opinion.

Title: US15 – Edit comment
Description: As the comment author I want to edit my comment so that I can correct mistakes.

Title: US16 – Delete comment
Description: As the comment author I want to delete my comment so that I keep control over my content.

Title: US17 – Moderate comments
Description: As the author of a blogpost I want to delete any comment on my post so that I can remove inappropriate content.

Title: US18 – Search
Description: As a visitor I want to search posts by title, user, or tag so that I can find relevant content.

Title: US19 – Online users statistic
Description: As an admin I want to see the number of online users so that I can monitor platform usage.

Title: US20 – Visitor count statistic
Description: As an admin I want to see total number of visitors so that I understand platform popularity.

Title: US21 – Enforce JWT authorization
Description: As the system I want protected endpoints to require a valid token so that user data stays secure.

Title: US22 – Ownership checks
Description: As the system I want to ensure users can only edit their own posts or comments so data integrity is preserved.

Title: US23 – Error handling
Description: As the system I want clean and correct error responses so that the API behaves professionally.

Title: US24 – Project analysis
Description: As a team we want to create a full project analysis so that the architecture is clear.

Title: US25 – Class diagrams
Description: As a developer I want to create class diagrams so that the data model is well structured.

Title: US26 – Sequence diagrams
Description: As a team we want sequence diagrams for login, CRUD, and comments so flows are visual.

Title: US27 – Flowcharts
Description: As a team we want flowcharts for system processes so the logic is easy to understand.

Title: US28 – Prepare presentation
Description: As a team we want to create a 20–30 min presentation so that we can demonstrate our work.

Title: US29 – Prepare live demo
Description: As a team we want to prepare a live Postman demo so that we can show real API usage.

Title: US30 – Highlight key features
Description: As a team we want to explain why the product is valuable so the audience understands its strengths.

Title: US31 – Divide presentation tasks
Description: As a team we want each member to present a part so everyone contributes.
